Registry of Open Data on AWS

CCAFS-Climate Data

agriculture climate food security sustainability

Description

High resolution climate data to help assess the impacts of climate change primarily on agriculture. These open access datasets of climate projections will help researchers make climate change impact assessments.

Update Frequency

Every three months

License

Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/

Documentation

http://www.ccafs-climate.org

Contact

http://www.ccafs-climate.org/contact/

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    ARC GRID, and ARC ASCII format compressed
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::cgiardata
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://cgiardata/ --no-sign-request
